name: Cross Dimensional
description:
United Game Jam 2020 Submission.

A Game by: Abaasa Joe Taga & Jay Elbourne

A Game about the unknown and the unreachable.

You are the witness of a journey through dimensions, space and time. Move between the 1D world through the 3D space we call reality only to find perhaps you aren't ready for the truth.

Game Jam Theme: Two

  • We started with the idea of building a game that lives in two different dimensions.
  • We wanted two main control mechanics, Movement and Scale.
  • We decided to build the game together as a pair, 2 developers is better than 1.
  • Each dimension we wanted to talk to 2 entities before transitioning to the next.

Game Jam Info: (Tools Used)

  • Unreal Engine 4.25 (Engine)
  • Blender 2.8 (Modeling/Rigging/Animating)
  • CakeWalk by BandLab (Audio)
